attributes.action: Cancel the BBC TV licence for a subscription type service
attributes.additional_details: The most of type of TV licence is out dated and does not work in the current economy. Changing this to a subscription type service will mean the individuals who want to what it can and other can use other services. It should not be compulsory to pay for something you do not want.
attributes.background: Change the TV licence to a subscription type service

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Scrap the BBC TV Licence & replace funding with adverts or paywall 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727365
